name: Shrouded Divine Knight, Gablade
effect:
Updated: Text
[Stride]-Stride Step-[COST][Choose one or more cards from hand with the sum of their grades being 3 or greater, and discard them], and [Stride] this card on your (VC) from face down.
[ACT]G Zone:If your vanguard is a grade 3 "Blue Sky Knight, Altmile", and you did not get an Imaginary Gift this fight, [COST][choose one or more cards from hand with the sum of their grades being 3 or greater, and discard them], and [Stride] this card on your (VC) from face down. Then, [COST][turn a card from G zone with the same card name as this unit face up], and you get two Imaginary Gift:Force.
[CONT](VC):This unit's "when attack hits" effects activate even if the attack did not hit.
[AUTO](VC):When this unit's attack hits a vanguard, search your deck for up to one grade 2 or greater card, call it to (RC), and shuffle your deck.
productName: [G-TD02] Divine Swordsman of the Shiny Star

name: Blue Sky Knight, Altmile
effect:
[CONT](VC)[Generation Break 2](This ability is active if you have two or more face up G units in total on your (VC) or G zone):During your turn, all of the units in your front row get [Power] +5000.
[AUTO](VC):[Counter-Blast 1] During your turn, when your G unit [Stride], you may pay the cost. If you do, choose up to two cards from your hand, call them to separate (RC), choose up to two of your units, and those units get [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
productName: [G-TD02] Divine Swordsman of the Shiny Star

name: Aurashooter Dragon
effect:

[AUTO]:[Counter-Blast 2] When this unit is placed on (VC), you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to one grade 2 or greater card, call it to (RC), and shuffle your deck.
